title: Benefits of genetic diversity in a population

content.question: (a) Describe the process that maintained a stable Tasmanian devil population size before the appearance of <math alttext="D F T D" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>DFTD</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> in 1996.

frqParts.text: (a) Describe the process that maintained a stable Tasmanian devil population size before the appearance of <math alttext="D F T D" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>DFTD</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> in 1996.

(b) Explain how the huge reduction of the Tasmanian devil population since 1996 affects the susceptibility of the current population to new diseases in comparison with the susceptibility of the population before 1996.

(c) Tasmanian devils are top predators and are considered a keystone species in their community. Predict the effect of the rapid reduction of the Tasmanian devil population on the rest of the community.
